title_en: English Language Summer School 2025 Adcote Matrix International
title_zh: 2025年阿德科特国际英语暑期学校
overview_en: Our 3-week English Language Summer School is designed for learners aged 10 to 14, offering a comprehensive and immersive experience to develop English language skills. The program welcomes students of all proficiency levels and combines classroom learning with a variety of extracurricular activities, ensuring a well-rounded and enriching experience. Students will reside on our secure, 20-acre campus, equipped with modern amenities, and enjoy a structured daily routine that balances academics, sports, cultural activities, and social events.​
overview_zh: 我们的3周英语夏令营专为10至14岁的学习者设计，提供全面且沉浸式的体验，帮助学生提升英语语言能力。该项目欢迎所有英语水平的学生参加，将课堂学习与丰富多彩的课外活动相结合，确保学生获得全面而充实的体验。学生将入住我们占地20英亩的安全校园，校园配备现代化设施，并享受结构化的日常安排，平衡学术、体育、文化活动和社交活动。​
highlights_en:
Experienced Teachers: Courses are taught by experienced classroom teachers with teaching assistant support.

Comprehensive English Skills Development: Focus on improving reading, writing, speaking, listening, grammar, and vocabulary.

Extracurricular Activities: Music, sports, cultural activities, and social events enrich the boarding experience.

Cultural Tours: Opportunities to explore local galleries and cultural exhibitions, learning about Malaysia in a fun and educational way.

Global Friendships: Students practice their English skills while forming friendships with peers from around the world.
highlights_zh:
经验丰富的教师：课程由经验丰富的课堂教师授课，并配有助教支持。

全面的英语能力发展：专注于阅读、写作、口语、听力、语法和词汇的提升。

课外活动：音乐、体育、文化活动和社交活动，丰富寄宿生活体验。

文化游览：有机会探索当地画廊和文化展览，以有趣且富有教育意义的方式了解马来西亚。

全球友谊：学生可以在与来自世界各地的同伴建立友谊的同时，运用他们的英语技能。

features_en:
Small Class Size: Maximum 15 students per class for personalized attention.

Certification: Students receive an official certificate upon program completion.

Safety Measures: 24/7 supervision, secure campus, and trained staff.

Health Services: On-site medical support for any health concerns.

Dietary Accommodations: Special dietary requirements can be accommodated with advance notice.

Accommodation: Students reside in our state-of-the-art campus with modern, eco-friendly facilities. Boys and girls stay in separate boarding houses.

Daily Life: Carefully managed by residential staff to ensure a safe, orderly, and supportive environment.

Life Skills: Activities designed to foster independence, teamwork, and community living.

Housekeeping and Laundry: Basic services provided to ensure comfortable accommodation.

Orientation: Students receive orientation guidance on the first day to help them adjust to the new environment.
features_zh:
住宿：学生们住在我们最先进的校园内，拥有现代化、环保的设施。男生和女生分别住在不同的寄宿楼中。

日常生活：由驻校工作人员精心管理，确保一个安全、有序且支持性的环境。

生活技能：设计活动以培养独立性、团队合作和社区生活能力。

Housekeeping和洗衣：提供基本服务，确保住宿舒适。

迎新：学生在第一天接受迎新指导，帮助他们适应新环境。
other_info_en:
Visa Requirements: Students should apply for a student pass; assistance provided with application.

What to Bring: Comfortable clothing, personal items, electronic devices (optional), and pocket money.

Communication: Wi-Fi available throughout campus; set communication schedules with parents.

Insurance: All students must have international health insurance coverage.

Local Transportation: All transportation during the program is provided and supervised.
other_info_zh:
阿德科特马来西亚分校由Matrix国际学校与阿德科特全球学校合作成立，结合了两所机构的优势与卓越教育成果。阿德科特在全球享有盛誉，其校区遍布英国和中国等 prestigious locations。​

阿德科特英国校区 位于什鲁斯伯里，是一所历史悠久的英国寄宿学校，成立于1907年。2024年，这所百年名校不仅将英国阿德科特学校引入马来西亚，还进一步提升了Matrix国际学校的教育资源、课程设置及先进管理模式。​

学校提供的餐饮为清真食品，新鲜且营养丰富。学生将获得均衡、多样化且美味的饮食。​
